mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.inv_id AS "invInfo.id", bi.name AS "invInfo.name", a.inv_type AS "invType", a.sku_id AS "skuInfo.id", bsi.name AS "skuInfo.name", a.stock_qty AS "stockQty", a.stock_change_qty AS "stockChangeQty", a.now_stock_qty as "nowStockQty", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.req_id AS "requestHeader.id", rh.req_no AS "requestHeader.reqNo", rh.from_type AS "requestHeader.fromType", u.name as "createBy.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.status AS "delFlag"

LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_info bi on bi.id = a.inv_id Left JOIN biz_request_header rh on rh.id=a.req_id LEFT JOIN sys_office cent ON cent.id = rh.from_id LEFT JOIN biz_sku_info bsi on bsi.id = a.sku_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = a.create_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_inventory_view_log( id, inv_id, inv_type, sku_id, stock_qty, stock_change_qty, now_stock_qty, req_id, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{invInfo.id}, #{invType}, #{skuInfo.id}, #{stockQty}, #{stockChangeQty}, #{nowStockQty}, #{requestHeader.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_inventory_view_log SET inv_id = #{invInfo.id}, inv_type = #{invInfo.type}, sku_id = #{skuInfo.id}, stock_qty = #{stockQty}, stock_change_qty = #{stockChangeQty}, now_stock_qty=${nowStockQty}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
